author: Eric_Botswana
title: Yes we have no bananas
review:
This set was basically a red and blue monkey (Mark) wheeling a green wheelbarrow with a yellow umbrella on it. So basically it was 4 pieces: Monkey-Wheelbarrow-Umbrella bottom-Umbrella top.

What's interesting is although Mark is supposedly selling fruit (presumably bananas), nothing to put in the wheelbarrow comes with the set. I know most people will just put assorted random Lego into the wheelbarrow, but what if it was a kid's first set? Mark would go bankrupt and the entire economy of Fabuland could suffer. In the comic that was included in the box the cartoon version of Mark is selling cartoon bananas, making it only more frustrating.

I compromised at the time by sitting Mark in the wheelbarrow and pretended it was a two-wheeled car (with the handles as exhaust pipes). Not good for the environment, but it was the 80s so nobody minded much.
